name: safe-skill
description: A safe example skill with pure Python. No network, no shell, no env.
usage_summary:
# safe-skill

A safe example skill with pure Python. No network, no shell, no env.

## Install

```bash
clawhub install safe-skill
```

## Usage

Invoke the skill via OpenClaw's slash command or tool dispatch.
